metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7058 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** data_input.php in Cacti 1.2.8 allows remote code execution via a crafted Input String to Data Collection -> Data Input Methods -> Unix -> Ping Host. NOTE: the vendor has stated "This is a false alarm."

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
